data.text: @covid19ptbo How does this make any sense.. Pray for those who choose to be blind.
@covid19ptbo @Pandemic_Times So eff all the morons not wearing masks.
@covid19ptbo Hmmm... can't see wearing an n95 mask and only having 30% protection. I wear an n95 to protect me.
@covid19ptbo I think the data would show that if the contact was wearing an N95 the risk would not be 70%.  I appreciate the illustration though

@mymexidogcorgi @UnderhillS13 @covid19ptbo @DFortais I lived in Belfast during the troubles the city centre was fenced off to protect from bombs.  To work, shop you had to be pat downed and searched it was an inconvenience but necessary to protect ppl. There was the odd bomb but those precautions protected you from deadly attacks

@covid19ptbo The actual numbers do not back up your percentages.  If you really believe your twaddle, look at this and try it again with a straight face...
https://t.co/nw6PJfyAM2
@DCronin2 @RandyRebel59 @covid19ptbo I think a mask killed their parents.
@RandyRebel59 @covid19ptbo Did a mask steal your bike or something?

@covid19ptbo @savoirfaire_2 This is a good illustration of how wearing a mask shows your concern for other people.  My wearing a mask only helps me a little, but it helps everyone around me a lot.  For the sake of the vulnerable we should ALL wear masks whether we're personally worried about Covid or not.
